Exclusive Services Get rider services which are unique and only available at Tboda

Fast Delivery Blazing fast order delivery within time with trusted riders!
//About TBoda TBoda was started to enhance security measures and quicker movements around Taita region which comprises of Voi Town and TTU areas.It is safe to ride with us because we have the personal details of our riders incase of any insecurity reasons we are able to trace back in our databases. We also offer delivery and courier services with our entrusted riders so you do not have to worry about your luggage or parcel it is delivered right to your door step.
